list.title: Search API V2
list.description: We will improve the stability and performance of the Search API.

list.title: Portal V1
list.description: We will build a portal so that users can add, delete and update their subscriptions and suppliers for themselves.

list.title: Search Testing
list.description: Provide the ability to test a supplier search in the portal. Users can execute a search and then analyse the related response, logs and audit information.

list.title: SEarch Reporting
list.description: Provide information and statistics about searches in the portal.
